room_title: Escape room "The Curse" by Puzzah! in Denver
room_address: FlatIron Crossing, 1 W Flatiron Circle #2153 Broomfield, CO 80021
room_description: You enter an ancient chamber buried deep in the jungles of Central America. You're on a mission organized by Victor Maragana, an industrialist who believes the secret to ending a family curse is hidden inside. Use your wits and explore carefully or the curse may fall on you!
